title: Applicability
context: [§553A-21] Applicability. This chapter applies to a transfer within the scope of section 553A-2 made after July 1, 1985 if: (1) The transfer purports to have been made under the Hawaii Uniform Gifts to Minors Act; or (2) The instrument by which the transfer purports to have been made uses in substance the designation &ldquo;as custodian under the Uniform Gifts to Minors Act&rdquo; or &ldquo;as custodian under the Uniform Transfers to Minors Act&rdquo; of any other state, and the application of this chapter is necessary to validate the transfer. [L 1985, c 91, pt of §1] Revision Note &ldquo;July 1, 1985&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;its effective date&rdquo;.
